ğŸš€Discover the latest additions to the Microsoft Flight Simulator marketplace this week and at the flying experience. This week several new aircrafts have landed which are a mix of military aircrafts as well as generic aircrafts including: the Airbus A380-800, Boeing 737 Max, CH-47, CH-54, Hawk T1 and several more. In addition to this livery packs for multiple aircraft types, amongst them the A330, are now available. Whether you are experienced pilot or an aviation enthusiast, this is essential.
